root.name: 1955 - The Secret Mission
root.description: The game is based in 1955. You play as the last allied pilot and you have just been given a secret mission to destroy a secret weapon codenamed "The Iron Canon". You are required to fly your P-42 fighter deep into enemy territory to destroy the said weapon before it can be made ready.As the game is java based the graphics are not advanced. There are various enamies to engage including multiple bosses. Powerups and extra lives can befound within the game and there are two levels of difficulty.
